title: key fragments and honor 5
body:
hey!
In my LAN account (this account is only to be able to ask questions like this one on the NA boards) i'm honor 5, but i'm still receiving key fragments. I thought that once you've reached honor 4 and above you'll be start wining capsules. I was wrong?

Thanks for the reply and sorry for the crappy english (feel free and encouraged to correct any grammar mistakes)

replies.body: Honor capsules are not guaranteed drops at any specific Honor rank. They're bonus drops that have a chance of replacing those key fragments.
Any plans to implement 'bad luck protection' on these? I was surprised to learn that it didn't already exist on chests, which I assume means it also doesn't exist for honor capsules. Is that right?

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=T1PFehLM,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-09-04T02:42:53.064+0000)
>
> Honor capsules are not guaranteed drops at any specific Honor rank. They're bonus drops that have a chance of replacing those key fragments.

Hey Broporo!

Thanks for the answer, I suppose it's just my bad luck then {{sticker:cass-cry}} 


P.S. We don't say this as much as we should, but you do a really great and important job here. Keep it up :D
